outboundReferences.contextLine: [eldadru/ksniff: Kubectl plugin to ease sniffing on kubernetes pods using tcpdump and wireshark](https://github.com/eldadru/ksniff) [[tools]]

inboundReferences.contextLine: To aid in understanding [[kubernetes-networking]], [[service-mesh]], [[gateway-api]], it will be helpful to know what Envoy does and how it works. Comparing it with [[ingress]] would also be helpful.
